pages.text: $(thing)Amulets$() are magical jewels that $(m)give$() the user the power of the element from which it was made! $(br2)All amulets $(l)have$() 4 tiers, $(#a52a2a)WOODEN$(), $(7)IRON$(), $(6)GOLD$() and $(b)DIAMOND$() (or 1, 2, 3, 4)! Same amulet $(l)can have$() different powers on other tier!
This is 'empty' amulet,  a shell for all other amulets! It is made of $(item)$(l:elementalamulets:getting_started/introduction)elemental shards$(). Here is recipe for it!
Craft empty amulet! $(br2)To make an amulet, you need an empty amulet! So it's time to $(thing)craft$() it!
